description: Defines the DetailsDescriptionPresenter class responsible for rendering recipe details in a TV app UI, including view holder management and data binding.

classes.name: DetailsDescriptionPresenter
classes.description: Presenter class for displaying detailed recipe descriptions in the Android TV frontend.

classes.name: ViewHolder
classes.description: Inner class holding references to the UI components for recipe details.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and returns a ViewHolder for recipe detail views.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds recipe data to the ViewHolder for display.

methods.name: onUnbindViewHolder
methods.description: Handles cleanup when view holder is unbound (no operation).
